Package org.purewidgets.shared.im

Class Summary
Application  
InputEventHelper  
Place  
UrlHelper  
Widget This code (as all code in the shared package) is shared between the server and client.
WidgetInput The WidgetInput class represents an input from a user to an option of a widget.
WidgetOption A WidgetOptionID represents an item or option, within a widget, that can be independently selected by a user.
WidgetParameter A general purpose name-value pair, used to store widget parameters.
